metadata.base_style: hyper-realistic, cinematic food choreography, seamless transitions

sequence.camera: slow orbital tracking shot, slight upward tilt
sequence.description: Chicken breast slices, broccoli florets, whole eggs, and a protein shaker remain suspended mid-air in ultra slow motion, glowing softly in warm kitchen light.

sequence.transition: As the camera circles, each raw ingredient begins transforming mid-air: chicken breast sears with golden grill marks, broccoli turns vibrant green as if steamed, eggs crack and hard-boiled halves float apart with yolk exposed, and rice grains materialize in a neat mound.

sequence.camera: macro zooms on each transformation, then dolly back to wide shot
sequence.description: The food completes its transformation mid-flight. Chicken breast is now juicy and perfectly grilled, broccoli steaming lightly, boiled eggs gleaming, and a mound of fluffy white rice forms on the cutting board surface. The protein shaker finishes assembling itself with condensation droplets forming on the glass.

sequence.motion: Zero-gravity choreography: cooked ingredients orbit gracefully, then descend in sync toward a white porcelain plate appearing on the kitchen table. Steam rises as they settle neatly onto the plate.
sequence.special_effects: light flares reflecting on glistening chicken, steam trails from broccoli, condensation forming in real time on the shaker

sequence.ending: The final hero shot reveals a complete muscle-meal plate: grilled chicken breast, steamed broccoli, fluffy white rice, and boiled eggs, neatly plated with a chilled protein shake beside it, all resting on a clean wooden kitchen table.

audio.music: Ethereal cinematic strings swelling into a triumphant resolution as the dish completes
audio.sound_effects: sizzle of chicken searing, subtle hiss of steam, soft clink as food lands on plate
audio.mix_level: balanced mix with sounds synced tightly to each transformation
